sense.def: Pathological Condition of a disease affecting the throat with pain and itching and loss of voice. ZBY HL 30: 屍咽者，謂腹內屍蟲，上食人喉咽生瘡。其狀或癢或痛 , “ Corpse [bugs/worms] throat is to say: corpse bugs/worms in the abdomen rise to gnaw on the throat and thereby cause sores. The [disease] manifests itself sometimes as itching and sometimes as pain. Shi yang 濕癢 , moisture itching [37]

Illness Sign of topical emission of liquid together with itching. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry she chuang zi 蛇床 子：主婦人陰中腫痛，男子陰痿濕癢 , “It controls swelling and pain in the female private parts. In males dysfunction of the yin [member, i.e. penis], with moisture itching ”.
